title: Red Bull Powers Up: New Kit Unveiled Ahead of Roglič’s Tour de France Yellow Jersey Chase
content:
Red Bull's arrival as co-sponsor and majority owner of the German-based team is the biggest news to hit the cycling marketplace in decades. Will it pay off with yellow?

Read the full article at Red Bull Powers Up: New Kit Unveiled Ahead of Roglič’s Tour de France Yellow Jersey Chase on Velo.
author: ahood
